content: the yarn used to crochet this pattern is chunky weight 5 the written pattern list all the colors used to crochet the throw you can purchase the ads free printable pdf written pattern with a lot of pictures on ravelry or etsy here https //www etsy com/listing/1379622795/nature-inspired-crochet-chunky-throw click_key=5e0058e58e73cfbd046d23c74a677fb71cac0a0b%3a1379622795&click_sum=02488f64&ref=shop_home_active_22&clickfromshopcard=1 this pattern is also available on my website and it is free here https //knitandcrochetdesign com/nature-inspired-crochet-chunky-throw/
